attributes.action: Increase sentences and create a public database for dog cruelty offenders
attributes.additional_details:
Hundreds of dogs are subject to abuse at the hands of their owners, whether that’s neglect, physical abuse or even death.
 
I think the consequences of these actions are minute, and that it is too easy for abusers to go on to reoffend, and there should be tougher measures put in place. A public system that allows the public to see who has been convicted of abusing dogs would be helpful.
attributes.background: I think the government should increase the sentences for dog abusers, including an automatic ban on future dog ownership. I also think there needs to be a public database that can be accessed to see who has been convicted as an dog abuser.
